attributes.additional_details:
As no physical punishment has been allowed at schools for many years yobbos and others have assumed that what ever they do there will never be any physical harm done to them.
Next Thursday when parliament meets they should take a vote on the motion of 'Should we allow rioters to merely go to prison for a few weeks or should they be subjected to some physical pain for their misdemeanors.'
A 'Cat and Ninetails' could be operated by mechanical means with doctors standing by to insure the safety of the recipient and claims of sadism from protesters.
The prisons are full and rioting might well cease overnight.
